channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prioritizing Eye Wellness In The Modern Workplace: The Future Of Vision, Technology And Productivity
item.description: Companies and professionals alike must recognize that investing in vision-friendly technology is not just about comfort—it’s about sustainability.

item.title: The Rise Of SoftPOS: What Businesses Need To Know
item.description: Successfully leveraging SoftPOS requires a balance between innovation and mitigating potential hurdles.

item.title: Samsung Updates Millions Of Galaxy Phones To Stop Attacks
item.description: This update is perfectly timed—but it’s not for everyone. Here’s what to know.

item.title: AI-Powered Law Firms: LexisNexis CTO Reveals Why Waiting Is Not An Option
item.description: The work lawyers do lends itself perfectly to generative AI: drafting documents, conversational search, to answering questions. So what does the futur...

item.title: Charting The Path Forward To Value-Based Care
item.description: Each organization’s journey to VBC will be unique, but certain principles for success are universal.

item.description: One way to understand creative work is to think about the time and effort required to do something the first time versus doing it again. A novel might...

item.title: Picky or particular?

item.title: Maybe it’s in how you tell it

item.title: Throat clearing
